sources.title: Close-Up
sources.description: Title: Close-Up Summary: After his photo is accidentally taken, that someone will do everything in his power to get hold of the negative. Directed by: Jack Donohue Actors: Alan Baxter, Virginia Gilmore, Richard Kollmar Production Company: Harry Brandt Productions Release Date: 9 June 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 After his photo is accidentally taken, that someone will do everything in his power to get hold of the negative.

sources.title: Close Up (1948) NEW YORK NOIR
sources.description:
Stars: Alan Baxter, Virginia Gilmore, Richard Kollmar
Director: Jack Donohue

When a Nazi war criminal is accidentally caught on film by a newsreel cameraman, he will do everything in his power to get the negative!

metadata.Plot: After his photo is accidentally taken, that someone will do everything in his power to get hold of the negative.
metadata.Writer: John Bright, Jack Donohue, James Poe
metadata.Actors: Alan Baxter, Virginia Gilmore, Richard Kollmar
